Text: Re Enron India GDR Holding Ltd EIGHL Brokerage Account Cc Could you please contact Lauren Hagerty who will be arriving in Houston this afternoon on her way back from Bombay please call her at home I think she has already prepared the appropriate documentation If you are unable to contact her please call me in Bombay on my mobile Thanks Sandeep

Re Enron India GDR Holding Ltd EIGHL Brokerage Account Cc Could you please contact Lauren Hagerty who will be arriving in Houston this afternoon on her way back from Bombay please call her at home I think she has already prepared the appropriate documentation If you are unable to contact her please call me in Bombay on my mobile Thanks Sandeep

Coal Trading IndiaRob Walls has referred me to you I dont believe we have met but I am for my sins the acting General Counsel at Enron India We are thinking of starting coal trading activities in India and I am trying to get hold of some standard form contracts we may have used for our coal trading activities in North America Would it be possible to forward any such forms to me so that I can start the exercise of seeing what issues we may have under Indian law Perhaps you could e mail them or alternatively have someone fax them to me on Many thanks Sandeep
